column5: coming at you live from the nipigon area Limited internet access so I'll make it quick. All lakes are broken up around the shoreline and ice is getting darker every minute. Very warm weather forecast for the next weeks so things will go quick. Should easily be ice off inland lakes may 10. Nipigon a week later
How's the water levels in your area? A number of folks are reporting below normal where they are. Thanks, Bill
We Had ALOT of snow here so things look normal. Once things break up a bit more I'll know for sure
